column2: No! I lost again.[~]Ugh... Well, fine. You can boss me around like you used to.
Well, I don’t remember [f2]too[/f] much about the things we used to have you do,[~]but if you can keep it in check then maybe, [f2]maybe[/f] you can have some fun.
I might just be imagining it, but if you helped me out...[~]Thank you. Reynn, Lann.
